mapper.select: select h.*, c.*, g.*, m.* from examination_info h, examination_course_teacher hct, examination_class hc, class c, grade g, major m where hct.teacher_id=#{teacherID} and hct.course_id=#{courseID} and hct.examination_id=h.id and hc.examination_id=h.id and hc.class_id=c.class_id and c.grade_id=g.id and g.major_id=m.major_id

select count(*) from examination_student hs, student_info si, class c, grade g, major m, user u where hs.examination_id=#{onlinetestID} and hs.student_id=si.sid and si.sclass_id=c.class_id and c.grade_id=g.id and g.major_id=m.major_id and si.sid=u.user_id and si.sclass_id in
(#{item})
and state=#{stateChecked} and iscomment=#{commentChecked}
and concat(u.user_id, u.username) LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{studentInfo},'%')

select count(*) from examination_student hs, student_info si where hs.examination_id=#{onlinetestID} and hs.state=1 and si.sid=hs.student_id
and si.sclass_id in
(#{item})
and hs.student_id=si.sid

select count(*) from examination_student hs, student_info si where hs.examination_id=#{onlinetestID} and hs.state=1 and hs.iscomment=0 and si.sid=hs.student_id
and si.sclass_id in
(#{item})
and hs.student_id=si.sid

select count(*) from examination_student hs, student_info si where hs.examination_id=#{onlinetestID} and hs.state=0 and si.sid=hs.student_id
and si.sclass_id in
(#{item})
and hs.student_id=si.sid
mapper.update: update examination_info set sdate=#{sdate}, edate=#{edate} where id=#{onlinetestID}
update examination_student set comment=#{main} where examination_id=#{homeworkID} and student_id=#{studentID}
